name: Reunion (itch) (Jules Rouault)
description:
Play a desperate young man who starts a journey to find back his beloved

This game has been made in two days during the January 2021 Global Game Jam.

Hugo Cluzel (https://petite-bryndye.itch.io/) - Programmation, Narrative Design

Jules Rouault (Me) - Artist 2D, Voice actor as Him

Elena Andrikian (https://elena-andrikian.itch.io/) - Level Designer, Narrative Designer

Manon Ratie - Voice Actress as Her
